page.title: 09Our house in Clipstone
page.content: On entering our house through the front door you find yourself in the hall.Walking forward brings you into the dining room.In this room there is a table and chairs,two seats,a telephone, pictures of partridges and a clock on the wall.We have an electric fire in the dining room. Walking through an empty doorway brings you to the lounge.In the lounge there is a settee,coffee table, radio, television,and shelves.You can see our back garden through the window.Going to the left brings you into the kitchen.In here there is a sink, gas cooker cupboards,fidgefreezer, washing machine and tumble drier which we use to dry our clothes.Going upstairs brings you to the landing.On the left is our toilet and next to it my brothers Mark and Geoffrey's room. This is where they sleep and keep
